PATIENT_ID: TEST_SOLID_ORGAN_NC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-24 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-24 14:10:00
Category I activation for 28-year-old male. MVC. Blunt abdominal trauma.
BP 88/52, HR 126, RR 24, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-24 14:30:00
CT abdomen: splenic laceration Grade IV with active splenic extravasation.
Free fluid throughout the abdomen. Hemoperitoneum documented.
Solid organ injury confirmed: splenic injury.
Injury grade: Grade 4. Pseudoaneurysm identified.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-24 15:00:00
Grade IV splenic laceration with active extravasation.
Hemodynamic status initially unstable, required transfusion.
Post-resuscitation hemodynamic stability achieved.
Serial imaging not obtained. No follow-up CT ordered.
Repeat imaging not obtained despite high-grade injury.
No serial examination protocol documented.
